    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRGLTexture.Buffer

        public OVRGLTexture.Buffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a new OVRGLTexture.Buffer instance backed by the specified container. Changes to the container's content will be visible to the struct buffer instance and vice versa. The two buffers' position, limit, and mark values will be independent. The new buffer's position will be zero, its capacity and its limit will be the number of bytes remaining in this buffer divided by OVRGLTexture.SIZEOF, and its mark will be undefined.

        The created buffer instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
